abstract: The announcement came five weeks after Wal-Mart overturned decisions made by senior marketing executives to hire the Draft FCB Group as the lead agency to create ads.
snippet: The announcement came five weeks after Wal-Mart overturned decisions made by senior marketing executives to hire the Draft FCB Group as the lead agency to create ads.
lead_paragraph: For the third time in less than three months, Wal-Mart Stores has made major decisions affecting the advertising agencies that handle its giant marketing assignments.
